00081 #define THERMOSTAT_UI_CONF_CLUSTER_ZCL_CLIENT_CLUSTER_TYPE(clattributes, clcommands) \
00082 { \
00083    .id = THERMOSTAT_UI_CONF_CLUSTER_ID, \
00084    .options = { \
00085                 .type = ZCL_CLIENT_CLUSTER_TYPE, \
00086                 .security = ZCL_NETWORK_KEY_CLUSTER_SECURITY, \
00087               }, \
00088    .attributesAmount = ZCL_THERMOSTAT_UI_CONF_CLUSTER_CLIENT_ATTRIBTUES_AMOUNT, \
00089    .attributes = (uint8_t *)clattributes, \
00090    .commandsAmount = ZCL_THERMOSTAT_UI_CONF_CLUSTER_COMMANDS_AMOUNT, \
00091    .commands = (uint8_t *)clcommands \
00092 }

00168 typedef struct PACK
00169 {
00170   struct PACK
00171   {
00172     ZCL_AttributeId_t id;
00173     uint8_t type;
00174     uint8_t properties;
00175     uint8_t value;
00176     uint8_t minVal;
00177     uint8_t maxVal;
00178   } temperatureDisplayMode;
00179   
00180   struct PACK
00181   {
00182     ZCL_AttributeId_t id;
00183     uint8_t type;
00184     uint8_t properties;
00185     uint8_t value;
00186     uint8_t minVal;
00187     uint8_t maxVal;
00188   } keypadLockOut;
00189   
00190    struct PACK
00191   {
00192     ZCL_AttributeId_t id;
00193     uint8_t type;
00194     uint8_t properties;
00195     uint8_t value;
00196     uint8_t minVal;
00197     uint8_t maxVal;
00198   } scheduleProgVisibility;
00199 
00200    struct PACK {
00201     ZCL_AttributeId_t id;
00202     uint8_t type;
00203     uint8_t properties;
00204     uint16_t value;
00205   } clusterVersion;
00206 
00207 } ZCL_ThermostatUiConfClusterServerAttributes_t;
